nodes.text: Loo-Too was an astromech droid who served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the lead-up to the Galactic Civil War. Around 0 BBY, Loo-Too was assigned to Red Four of Red Flight who was deployed to assist Extraction Team Bravo in the Wobani system.

Loo-Too first appeared in the 2016 Star Wars Battlefront: Rogue One: X-wing VR Mission, a downloadable virtual reality add-on to the 2015 canon video game Star Wars Battlefront. However, as there are no subtitles provided, the official spelling of the droid's name is unclear at this time.
